name: Gale
flavor: The most common Windbound discipline, masters of the Gale Stance control powerful gusts of wind and create minor tornadoes. This Discipline provides a wide range of quick ways to reposition foes and Windy Terrain can provide a way to slow foes while accelerating allies. This Discipline also provides a great deal of mobility to the windbound themselves and, while it's lacking in damage, it has a great deal of options to Stagger or Accelerate creatures, controlling both positions and the initiative order.

stances.name: Breeze Stance
stances.desc: By manipulating the wind across the battlefield you grant your allies a favorable tailwind, enhancing their speed and mobility.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Push_, _Pull_, _Slide_, or allow an ally to Move, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you inflict _Accelerate_ on an ally they may Move 2.

stances.name: Razor Wind Stance
stances.desc: You know how to focus wind into a razor's edge, causing it to bite deeper and leave more significant wounds.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you create a _Windy_ space or _Crit_ with a _Wind_ Attack gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Expand the _Crit_ range with Wind Attacks by 1. When you _Crit_,  you may add _Bleed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) to the Attack.

stances.name: Squall Stance
stances.desc: By unleashing powerful, concentrated blasts of air, practitioners of the Squall Stance keep their foes off-balance and unable to strike.
stances.effect: If you _Staggered_ a foe you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to add _Prone_ (1 _Grit_) to the Attack.

techniques.name: Biting Winds
techniques.desc: You amplify the wind, creating a steep punishment for a foe who attempts to move through it.
techniques.trigger: A creature moves against the direction of a _Windy_ space.
techniques.effect: The Triggering creature chooses: Either they suffer _Push_ 2 in the direction of the _Windy_ space OR you Attack them using the below profile. The Target may pay 1 _Grit_ to reduce the effect to _Push_ 1 and impose Disadvantage on the attack or 2 _Grit_ to ignore this Reaction.
techniques.special: You may repeat this Reaction as many times as it is triggered by paying the Cost again.

techniques.name: Vacuum Strike
techniques.desc: As you strike with your weapon you launch a focused blast of air, amplifying and extending the strike.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile, adding _Bleed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on a _Hit_ and _Bleed_ 2 (2 _Reflex_) on a Crit. After attacking, repeat this Attack with Disadvantage in a Line 4 behind the Target.

techniques.name: Air Slash
techniques.desc: You fling out a sharpened edge of wind, cutting just as true as any blade.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Add _Staggered_ (1 _Momentum_) to this Attack. Reduce this Cost by 1 if you Crit.

techniques.name: Air Blast
techniques.desc: You unleash a sudden blast of air, knocking a foe back and off-balance.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.special: The Target may pay 1 _Momentum_ to, rather than rolling, treat the Attack Roll as a 10.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Repeat this Strike immediately after using it.

techniques.name: Air Cutter
techniques.desc: You create a blade of compressed wind in your hand, forging a razor-sharp, invisible blade.
techniques.effect: Equip the Air Cutter Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Air Cutter Wielded.
techniques.boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Air Cutter in each.

techniques.name: Headwind
techniques.desc: You create a powerful gust of wind and maintain it, forcing foes to slowly advance.
techniques.cost: 1 _Momentum_ at Refresh every Round this Enchant persists.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. Immediately after, the Area becomes _Windy_, with the direction pointing directly away from you. While this Enchant is active the Area remains _Windy_ and moves with you. You may pay 1 _Momentum_ to change the direction at the start or end your turn. You may end this _Enchant_ as a Reaction to inflict _Staggered_ (2 _Grit_) on all foes in the area.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area is instead a 3x6 Line and the Cost increases to 2.

techniques.name: Swift Breeze
techniques.desc: You bring a breeze in from an odd angle, creating a wave across the battlefield and maneuvering a creature.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. You may make any spaces a creature is _Slide_d through _Windy_ until the end of the Round.
techniques.special: The Target may pay 1 _Momentum_ to, rather than rolling, treat the Attack Roll as a 10.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Inflict either _Accelerate_ or _Staggered_ (2 _Momentum_) on the Target.

techniques.name: Whirlwind
techniques.desc: You twist and turn the wind about yourself, creating a vortex of wind.
techniques.cost: 1 _Momentum_ at Refresh every Round this Enchant persists.
techniques.effect: Make the Area _Windy_, with the direction of all spaces pointing either directly towards the center of the area or directly away from the center. The center space is not windy.
techniques.special:
Depending on the direction of the _Windy_ spaces, you gain one of the two following Reactions while this Enchant persists:
Inward: If a Ranged Attack enters any of the Area, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to make it instead Target the creature in the center of the Area.
Outward: If a Ranged Attack would pass through the Area, you may pay 2 _Momentum_ to allow the attacker to instead have the attack originate from any _Windy_ space in the Area.
techniques.boost:
1 _Momentum_. You may take this Boost at the start of any Turn. Move the Area 2 in any direction.
	1 _Momentum_. Instead of a Blast 1, Area is instead Burst 1 and Range is Self. The Area moves with you and is always centered on you.

techniques.name: Updraft
techniques.desc: You provide an updraft for an ally, allowing them to quickly launch themselves into the air.
techniques.trigger: You or an allied creature enters a _Windy_ space.
techniques.effect: The target creature may immediately _Flying_ Move 2.
techniques.boost:
1 _Momentum_. _Accelerate_ the Target.
	1 _Reflex_. Trigger instead becomes 'You or an allied creature starts their turn.'

techniques.name: Tailwind
techniques.desc: You dash forward at a rapid speed, granting a bit of the wind's speed to another.
techniques.effect: _Accelerate_ a creature within Range.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Create two _Windy_ spaces adjacent to you at the end of your Movement.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Focus_: Instead, Movement is Shift, Speed is 2, and you may _Accelerate_ two creatures.

techniques.name: Whirlwind Charge
techniques.desc: You sprint forward with reckless blast of air, blazing a path forward.
techniques.effect: The Movement granted by this Action must be in a straight line. Make all spaces of your choice you pass through _Windy_ until the end of the Round.
techniques.boost:
1 _Momentum_. You do  not have to move in a straight line.
	1 _Momentum_. _Pull_ 2 (1 _Grit_) a creature you move through or adjacent to, treating the oring as wherever you end your movement.

techniques.name: Wind Breaker
techniques.desc: You unleash a sudden gust, knocking a projectile out of the sky.
techniques.trigger: You or a creature within Range is Attacked with a Ranged Attack.
techniques.effect: Reroll the Attack and use the lower result.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. _Accelerate_ your ally.
techniques.special: Reduce the Cost by 1 if the creature being Attacked is in a _Windy_ space.

name: Storm
flavor: Channeling the essence of a thunderstorm, the Storm Stance creates powerful bursts of lighting that ripple over the battlefield. This Discipline has a great deal of fast, close-range attacks and powerful, forecast long range ones. In addition, it can play a great deal with the Shock condition, slowing foes down and limiting their ability to take Reactions while also enabling more and more powerful strikes by the windbound. While this Discipline doesn't interact with Terrain or Obstacles in a meaningful way, the constant hazards created by the Storm Discipline will limit the movement of foes and harshly punish those that fall into the windbound's traps.

stances.name: Bolt Stance
stances.desc: You control the storms in a direct fashion: you simply unleash it in as direct a way as possible, unleashing its devastating potential.
stances.accumulate: Every time you _Hit_ with an _Electric_ Attack gain 1 _Momentum_, every time you _Crit_ gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you use a _Electric_ Technique that inflicts _Shock_ you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to inflict no _Shock_ and instead add _Pierce_ equal to the total value of _Shock_ that would have been inflicted.

stances.name: Charged Stance
stances.desc: You hold the storm within yourself, something that carries a great amount of risk but also amplifies your power greatly.
stances.accumulate: At Refresh, gain _Momentum_ equal to your top two _Shock_ Tokens. Clear these Tokens.
stances.effect: All _Evade_ and _Block_ Reactions have their Cost increased by 1 against your Storm Attacks with _Stall_.
stances.special: You may choose not to clear your _Shock_ Tokens. You may always choose the order of your _Shock_ Tokens.

stances.name: Stormcaller Stance
stances.desc: You are adept at conducting lighting in the environment itself, calling down lighting in unexpected and dangerous ways.
stances.accumulate: The first time in a Phase that you hit with or a foe triggers an _Electric_ _Hazard_, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: You may choose not to trigger your _Electric_ _Hazard_s when an ally moves through them.
stances.special: Once per Round, after your _Hit_ or _Crit_ with an Attack, create a Burst 1 _Hazard_ around the Target. Destroy the _Hazard_ at the end of the next Phase. If the Target Moves or a creature other than you enters the _Hazard_, inflict 1 _Shock_ (1 _Reflex_) in the Area and deal 3 Damage.

techniques.name: Chain Lightning
techniques.desc: Your electricity strikes like a snake, leaping from one target to another in a vicious chain.
techniques.trigger: You inflict _Shock_, or have _Hit_ or _Crit_ with an _Electric_ Attack you had Advantage on.
techniques.effect: After resolving the Triggering Attack, Attack with the below Profile against a Secondary Target within Range 4 of the Triggering Target. Deal Damage equal to the topmost _Shock_ Token on the Triggering Target. If the Secondary Target Negates, they take half Damage.
techniques.special: You may repeat this Reaction as many times as it is triggered by paying the Cost again.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: The Trigger is instead: 'You are Attacked while having any _Shock_.'

techniques.name: Lightning Strike
techniques.desc: You channel electricity through your weapon, attacking with incredible, blinding speed.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile, adding _Shock_ 1 (1 _Grit_) on a _Hit_ and _Shock_ 2 (2 _Grit_) on a Crit.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add the _Teleport_ Keyword.

techniques.name: Lightning Palm
techniques.desc: You conjure a shocking burst in your hand, unleashing it at point blank range for a powerful strike.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add _Exposed_ 1 to the Attack and increase the cost to Negate by 1.

techniques.name: Electrocute
techniques.desc: You fire a stream of continuous electricty into a foe, limiting their mobility and electrifying them.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. While this Enchant persists, at the end of the Target's Turn you may repeat this Attack as a Reaction by paying 1 _Momentum_. This Enchant ends if you and the target are ever more than Range spaces apart.
techniques.boost:
0 _Momentum_: Gain _Shock_ 1. Increase the Damage by 1 while this Enchant persists.
	1 _Momentum_: Gain _Shock_ 2. Increase the Shock on a _Hit_ or _Crit_ by 1 while this Enchant persists.

techniques.name: Gigavolt Blast
techniques.desc: The ground nearby crackles with electricty, before a collosal bolt strikes down with incredible force.
techniques.effect: Create a Blast 1 _Hazard_ within Range. At the end of Phase 4 Destroy the _Hazard_. When the _Hazard_ is Destroyed, resolve the below Attack in the _Hazard_ spaces.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_ (max of 2): For each Momentum paid, Destroy the _Hazard_ one Phase later. For each _Momentum_ spent, increase the Damage by 2 and add _Shock_ 1 on a _Hit_ or Crit.

techniques.name: Discharge
techniques.desc: You let loose a barrage of energy at close range, amplifying it with any power stored within.
techniques.effect: Clear up to four value of _Shock_ Tokens, then Attack with the below Profile. If you _Graze_,  add half the cleared _Shock_ value to the Damage. On a _Hit_ or _Crit_, add all cleared _Shock_ value to the Damage.
techniques.special: You may clear additional _Shock_ Tokens as a part of this Attack, but take True Damage equal to its value for each additional _Shock_ Tokens cleared.
techniques.boost: 3 _Momentum_: Clear 2 more value of _Shock_, but don't add it to the Damage or take Damage from it. If you do, Area becomes Burst 2.

techniques.name: Lightning Bolt
techniques.desc: You shoot a powerful bolt of electricty, punching through all obstacles in its path.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_: For every _Momentum_ spent increase the Line by 2. Instead of paying _Momentum_ you may instead gain _Shock_ 1.

techniques.name: Gathering Storm
techniques.desc: A sudden storm appears overhead, crackling with electric energy that can strike the ground at any moment.
techniques.effect: Create 3 _Hazard_s within Range that are not adjacent to one another. If a creature enters one of these _Hazard_ spaces you may inflict _Shock_ 2 (2 _Reflex_) as a Reaction.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_ (paid every time a Hazard is triggered). Deal 2 plus the current Phase Damage to the triggering creature.

techniques.name: Charge
techniques.desc: You pull in nearby electricity, building up an electrical charge within yourself.
techniques.effect: Gain _Shock_ 2 and 1 _Reflex_. Gain a +1 Attack Bonus on your next Storm Attack.
techniques.boost: 1 _Grit_: Gain _Shock_ 3.

techniques.name: Shock Wave
techniques.desc: You amplify the electricity on a foe, removing their shock in a sudden burst.
techniques.effect:
Remove up to 3 value of _Shock_ from the foe. Deal Damage equal to the removed _Shock_, then purchase as many of the following Conditions as you wish:
1: The Target gains one of: _Hobbled_ 1, _Impair_ 1, _Exposed_ 1.
2: The Target gains one of: _Hobbled_ 2, _Impair_ 2, _Exposed_ 2.
3: The Target is _Restrained_ until the end of their next turn.
The Target may ignore the afflicted Condition by paying _Grit_ equal to the value removed.
techniques.special: The cost to Negate is increased by 1 if the Target is Soaked or in a Water Source.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_: You may remove up to 6 value of _Shock_. If you pick the _Restrained_ option more than once, add additional turns to the Condition.

techniques.name: Lightning Charriot
techniques.desc: You channel the power of the storm, traveling across the battlefield like a bolt of lightning.
techniques.effect: Create a Blast 1 _Hazard_ within Range. If a creature enters the _Hazard_, immediately _Destroy_ the _Hazard_. Otherwise, _Destroy_ the _Hazard_ at the end of Phase 3. If you are within Range of the _Hazard_ when it is Destroyed, immediately _Teleport_ Move to any space in the _Hazard_ and inflict _Shock_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) in the area.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead of Inflicting _Shock_ 1, deal 4 _Damage_ and inflict _Shock_ 2 (2 _Reflex_). If a creature Negates they take half Damage.

techniques.name: Overcharge
techniques.desc: You rely on electricity to provide your reaction speed, providing sudden evasion with a cost.
techniques.effect: Reroll the Attack and immediately _Safe_ Move 1. After resolving the Attack, gain _Shock_ 1.

name: Zephyr
flavor: The Zephyr Stance carries the body aloft, allowing speed and reactions that push the limits of human capability and even flight.

techniques.name: Curving Shot
techniques.trigger: You _Miss_ with a Ranged Attack using a Weapon.
techniques.desc: A sudden breeze catches your attack, redirecting it suddenly into another foe.
techniques.effect: Immediately repeat the Attack against a different Target within Range 4 of the original Target.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. The Attack has Advantage.

techniques.name: Windsweep
techniques.desc: You attack at lightning speed, making it near-impossible to dodge or counter.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile.

name: Howl
flavor: Howl Stance masters channel ancient, primal fear of storms and winds to shake enemies to their core, sending them fleeing from the battle.

name: Windwhisper
flavor: The Windwhisper Stance reads currents in the air, allowing an incredible ability to predict and react to attacks.
